entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
